alert.note: Alert for Johnson County, Casper BLM; Natrona County, Casper BLM (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 22 at 3:10AM MDT until July 22 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * IMPACTS: Low Humidities...Hot Temperatures...and Strong Gusty Winds may lead to erratic fire behavior. * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY Fire Zone....280. In North Central WY Fire Zone....281. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Natrona. In North Central WY...Johnson. * WIND: West 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. Isolated showers and thunderstorms could bring brief erratic 40 to 50 mph gusts. * HUMIDITY: 8 to 12 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs in the mid to upper 90s.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Johnson County, Casper BLM; Natrona County, Casper BLM
